channel.title: CVE Feed for lobehub -- lobe-chat
channel.description: The latest CVEs for lobehub -- lobe-chat

item.title: CVE-2024-24566|2024-01-31T16:33:44.129Z -- lobehub -- lobe-chat
item.description: Lobe Chat is a chatbot framework that supports speech synthesis, multimodal, and extensible Function Call plugin system. When the application is password-protected (deployed with the `ACCESS_CODE` option), it is possible to access plugins without proper authorization (without password). This vulnerability is patched in 0.122.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-32964|2024-06-06T17:36:50.260Z -- lobehub -- lobe-chat
item.description: Lobe Chat is a chatbot framework that supports speech synthesis, multimodal, and extensible Function Call plugin system. Prior to 0.150.6, lobe-chat had an unauthorized Server-Side Request Forgery vulnerability in the /api/proxy endpoint. An attacker can construct malicious requests to cause Server-Side Request Forgery without logging in, attack intranet services, and leak sensitive information.
